Package org.jpedal.examples.viewer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppletViewer

    Description: Demo to show JPedal being used as a GUI viewer in an applet, and to demonstrate some of JPedal's capabilities See also http://files.idrsolutions.com/samplecode/org/jpedal/examples/viewer/Viewer.java.html
    Commands
    This class contains code to execute the actual commands.
    MouseMode
    tracks option for our Viewer
    MultiViewer
    enhance Viewer with ability to include multiple windows for opening more than 1 PDF Run directly from jar with java -cp jpedal.jar org/jpedal/examples/viewer/MultiViewer See also Viewer example http://files.idrsolutions.com/samplecode/org/jpedal/examples/viewer/Viewer.java.html
    MultiViewListener  
    RecentDocuments  
    Values
    provides access to values used by multiple classes
    Viewer
    PDF viewer If you are compiling, you will need to download all the examples source files from http://www.idrsolutions.com/how-to-view-pdf-files-in-java/ Run directly from jar with java -cp jpedal.jar org/jpedal/examples/viewer/Viewer or java -jar jpedal.jar Lots of tutorials on how to configure on our website If you want to implement your own Very simple example at http://files.idrsolutions.com/samplecode/org/jpedal/examples/jpaneldemo/JPanelDemo.java.html But we would recommend you look at the full viewer as it is totally configurable and does everything for you.
